caption.p: Native-PAGE of superoxide dismutase (SOD) in developing grains and harvested seeds of contrasting wheat cvs. under differential HS, (a) In-gel activity assay of SOD in developing grains of wheat cvs. HD3086 and BT-Schomburgk under differential HS, (b) In-gel activity assay of SOD in harvested seeds of wheat cvs. HD3086 and BT-Schomburgk under differential HS; C - 22 ± 3℃, T 1 - 32℃, 2 h, T 2 - 38℃, 2 h; Native Gel (7%) was used for the native-PAGE.
